Settings.QueryText: SELECT DocumentEvent.Ref AS Ref, DocumentEvent.DeletionMark AS DeletionMark, DocumentEvent.Number AS Number, DocumentEvent.Date AS Date, DocumentEvent.Posted AS Posted, DocumentEvent.IncomingOutgoingEvent AS IncomingOutgoing, DocumentEvent.EventType AS EventType, DocumentEvent.State AS State, DocumentEvent.Subject AS Subject, DocumentEvent.Content AS Content, DocumentEvent.BasisDocument AS BasisDocument, DocumentEvent.EventBegin AS EventBegin, DocumentEvent.EventEnding AS EventEnding, DocumentEvent.Author AS Author, DocumentEvent.Responsible AS Responsible, DocumentEvent.PointInTime AS PointInTime, DocumentEvent.ParticipantsList AS ParticipantsList, DocumentEvent.UserAccount, CASE WHEN NOT DocumentEvent.DeletionMark THEN CASE WHEN DocumentEvent.EventType = VALUE(Enum.EventTypes.Email) THEN CASE WHEN DocumentEvent.IncomingOutgoingEvent = VALUE(Enum.IncomingOutgoingEvent.Incoming) THEN 0 ELSE 1 END WHEN DocumentEvent.EventType = VALUE(Enum.EventTypes.PhoneCall) THEN CASE WHEN DocumentEvent.IncomingOutgoingEvent = VALUE(Enum.IncomingOutgoingEvent.Incoming) THEN 2 ELSE 3 END WHEN DocumentEvent.EventType = VALUE(Enum.EventTypes.PersonalMeeting) THEN 4 WHEN DocumentEvent.EventType = VALUE(Enum.EventTypes.SMS) THEN 5 WHEN DocumentEvent.EventType = VALUE(Enum.EventTypes.Other) THEN 6 ELSE -1 END ELSE CASE WHEN DocumentEvent.EventType = VALUE(Enum.EventTypes.Email) THEN CASE WHEN DocumentEvent.IncomingOutgoingEvent = VALUE(Enum.IncomingOutgoingEvent.Incoming) THEN 7 ELSE 8 END WHEN DocumentEvent.EventType = VALUE(Enum.EventTypes.PhoneCall) THEN CASE WHEN DocumentEvent.IncomingOutgoingEvent = VALUE(Enum.IncomingOutgoingEvent.Incoming) THEN 9 ELSE 10 END WHEN DocumentEvent.EventType = VALUE(Enum.EventTypes.PersonalMeeting) THEN 11 WHEN DocumentEvent.EventType = VALUE(Enum.EventTypes.SMS) THEN 12 WHEN DocumentEvent.EventType = VALUE(Enum.EventTypes.Other) THEN 13 ELSE -1 END END AS IconIndex, DocumentEvent.Participants.( Ref, LineNumber, Contact, HowToContact ) AS TPParticipants, DocumentEvent.BasisDocuments.( Ref, LineNumber, BasisDocument ) FROM Document.Event AS DocumentEvent {WHERE (DocumentEvent.Participants.Contact IN (&Contacts)), (DocumentEvent.BasisDocument = &BasisDocument OR DocumentEvent.BasisDocuments.BasisDocument = &BasisDocument)}
